code: import React,{createContext,useState}from'react';export const AuthContext=createContext();const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[auth,setAuth]=useState(null);const login=user=>setAuth(user);const logout=()=>setAuth(null);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{auth,login,logout}},children);};export default AuthProvider;
